EXPLANATION.title: Goal of Picross
EXPLANATION.basis: Solve a grid by filling all the necessary cases using the indices for each line and column !
EXPLANATION.line: The numbers at the left of a line or at the top of a column show the number of consecutives cases to fill by clicking on it. There is at least one empty space two series of filled cases.
EXPLANATION.tip1: It's possible to cross cases that need to stay empty with the right click.
EXPLANATION.tip2: We can check up to 3 times by grid that that currently filled cases are correct.
EXPLANATION.tip3: At the beginning of a grid, you can start by filling lines/columns with the biggest numbers, with cases that have to be filled.
EXPLANATION.tip4: The clues fade away as the right number of cases are filled, even if they aren't rigth !
EXPLANATION.tip5: You can fill the grid faster by keeping the button down (left to fill, right for cross) and hovering over the cases you want to change.
